translation.en: [man 1] Mayday, mayday! We are under attack.
Under attack from our own people.
They just started shooting. They took out everyone.
translation.fr: Ils ont descendu tout le monde.

translation.en: -[man 2] Why are they doing this? -[man 1] They're ours. What's happening?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui leur prend ? Ils sont avec nous.

translation.en: [man 1] How many are there?
[man 2] They're everywhere! They're going for the command center.
They're going to take out the interceptors.
translation.fr: Ils vont détruire les intercepteurs. LES ÉTATS-UNIS N'ONT QUE DEUX BASES RADAR

translation.en: [man 1] They're killing us, they're killing everybody!
They reached the command center. I can't hold them off!
translation.fr: Ils ont atteint le centre opérations !

translation.en: [man 2] Somebody help us! Please, send help!
[man 1] We've got to call SBX-1.
[man 2] We can't! They destroyed the transmitter!
[man 1] This is Fort Greely. We have been overrun. Fort Greely--
translation.fr: Ici Fort Greely. On est envahis.

translation.en: [pilot] Coming up on SBX-1 now, Captain.
[pilot] SBX-1 this is Eagle 6-7.
I got your new missile system specialist here with me.
translation.fr: La nouvelle spécialiste missiles est là.

translation.en: Request permission to commence final approach.
[operator] Eagle 6-7 this is SBX-1, you're cleared for landing.
translation.fr: Eagle 6-7, ici SBX-1. Vous pouvez atterrir.

translation.en: Welcome to the middle of nowhere.
translation.fr: Bienvenue au milieu de nulle part.

translation.en: Captain Collins, I'm Ensign Washington.
Welcome to SBX-1,
or should I say "welcome back."
translation.fr: Ou plutôt, bon retour parmi nous.

translation.en: -Thanks. -[Washington] Colonel's waiting for you.
I heard you grew up in Spain at a base your dad was posted at.
translation.fr: Vous avez grandi en Espagne, là où votre père était en poste ?

translation.en: [male voice] Come in.
Captain Collins reporting, sir.
At ease.
Good to see you again, JJ.
You remember Captain Welsh? Yes, sir. You were just taking over when I rotated out.
translation.fr: - Vous vous souvenez du capitaine Welsh ? - Vous arriviez quand j'ai été transférée.

translation.en: Don't you mean escaped?
translation.fr: Quand on vous a sauvée, oui !

translation.en: [Welsh] Listen to this.
-Give us a minute, would you, Lou? -You bet.
translation.fr: - Tu peux nous laisser un instant, Lou ? - Oui.

translation.en: See if you can get us an update on that Russian sub.
translation.fr: Demande des nouvelles du sous-marin russe.

translation.en: Well, as you can see,
everything's pretty much the way you left it.
translation.fr: rien n'a changé depuis votre départ.

translation.en: Navy runs the boat, Army handles the missiles,
translation.fr: La marine gère le bateau, l'armée les missiles

translation.en: and everyone wants to be anywhere but here.
translation.fr: et personne ne veut être là.

translation.en: -Have you spoke with the board? -Three times.
translation.fr: - Vous avez parlé au conseil ? - Trois fois.

translation.en: [Collins] Showed them my record? My reviews?
Everything. This was the best you could do?
translation.fr: - Tout. - Et vous n'avez rien trouvé de mieux ?

translation.en: Sorry.
[Marshall] No, it's okay.
I thought I was done with this shit.
[Marshall] I know.
Never going to change, is it?
Thank you for taking me back.
For the record, I believed you from the start.
translation.fr: Je vous crois depuis le début.

translation.en: [Washington] We got you down here.
One of our guys nabbed your old room. Sorry about that.
translation.fr: Désolée, quelqu'un a pris votre ancienne chambre.

translation.en: Oh, ma'am?
Just want to say all of us girls are really proud of what you did.
translation.fr: Sachez que nous sommes toutes fières de ce que vous avez fait.

translation.en: What happened to you, well it's…
It's happened to a lot of us, and I just wanted you to know that.
translation.fr: C'est arrivé à beaucoup d'entre nous. Je tenais à vous le dire.

translation.en: I need you in the command center with your sidearm now.
translation.fr: Présentez-vous armée au C.O. tout de suite.

translation.en: We have an active shooter situation at Fort Greely.
translation.fr: Il y a eu des coups de feu à Fort Greely.

translation.en: Outsider? No, one of ours. Looks like more than one.
translation.fr: - Quelqu'un de l'extérieur ? - Non, des gars de chez nous.

translation.en: [Collins] Interceptors secure? [Marshall] Unknown.
translation.fr: - Les intercepteurs sont en sécurité ? - On l'ignore.

translation.en: [Collins] How bad is it?
Greely's gone dark. No calls in or out. We're getting all our information off Twitter.
translation.fr: On n'a plus aucun contact avec eux. Nos informations viennent de Twitter.

translation.en: [Marshall] Do we have Fort Greely on the line?
[soldier] Not yet, sir.
[Marshall] You know what to do.
Is Greely being jammed? No. It's like someone turned off the system at the source.
translation.fr: - Leurs communications sont brouillées ? - Non, le système semble être éteint.

translation.en: Corporal Rahul Shah. Joined us six months ago. Captain.
translation.fr: - Caporal Rahul Shah, là depuis six mois. - Capitaine.

translation.en: Corporal.
And you remember Beaver.
Miss me, Captain?
Not even once.
[Marshall] How's our Russian friend?
[Beaver] He's back.
Forty miles out and just sitting there like a turd in a swimming pool.
translation.fr: Il flotte à 60 km comme une merde dans une piscine.

translation.en: -[Collins] What friend? -Russian attack sub.
translation.fr: Quel ami russe ? Un sous-marin d'attaque russe qui traine.

translation.en: Been nosing about for months.
translation.fr: Un sous-marin d'attaque russe qui traine.

translation.en: Our subs keep chasing him away and he keeps coming back.
translation.fr: Nos sous-marins le chassent et il revient.

translation.en: What the hell's going on up there?
Hey. We still on for tonight? Dude, what?
translation.fr: - Ça tient toujours pour ce soir ? - Quoi ?

translation.en: Poker. I want to whip them janitors like last time.
translation.fr: On va encore torcher les concierges au poker.

translation.en: -Not now, Beaver. -What's wrong with now?
We're in an emergency.
Man, this ain't no emergency.
It's one crackpot with a grudge.
translation.fr: C'est un cinglé un peu énervé.

translation.en: I'd invite you, ma'am,
but there'll probably be a bit of locker room talk.
translation.fr: mais il y aura sans doute de l'humour graveleux.

translation.en: I've been practicing against some of the best players in the world
translation.fr: Je m'entraîne contre les meilleurs au monde

translation.en: with this little green guy.
Thing's probably more powerful than this entire room.
translation.fr: Il est plus puissant que tout ce local.

translation.en: Great story, Beaver. In what chapter do you shut the fuck up?
translation.fr: Fascinante histoire, Beaver. À quel chapitre vous fermez votre gueule ?

translation.en: Copy that, STRATCOM.
Sir, SBX-1 has just been assigned primary early warning status while Greely's offline.
translation.fr: SBX-1 doit se charger des détections tant que Fort Greely est déconnecté.

translation.en: All right, as of this moment we're the only interceptor platform
translation.fr: Nous sommes désormais le seul intercepteur

translation.en: protecting the United States from a nuclear missile attack.
translation.fr: qui protège les USA d'une attaque nucléaire.

translation.en: Square your shit away. Focus on the job you've been trained to do.
translation.fr: Faites la paix et concentrez-vous sur votre travail.

translation.en: Sir, we sure this is not some kind of drill or emergency test--
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui nous dit que ce n'est pas un test…

translation.en: Quiet.
NSA is relaying chatter from Russia.
translation.fr: La NSA transmet des rumeurs russes.

translation.en: Kremlin just received a priority alert from the ICBM missile base in Tavlinka.
translation.fr: Le Kremlin a reçu une alerte. La base de missiles intercontinentaux de Tavlinka subit une attaque.

translation.en: Tavlinka site under hostile attack.
translation.fr: La base de missiles intercontinentaux de Tavlinka subit une attaque.

translation.en: Multiple casualties.
Unauthorized missile removal.
No way.
Sixteen Topol-M mobile missiles unaccounted for.
You're saying someone stole 16 ICBMs?
I'm not saying it. The Russians are.
Sir, Greely goes dark and within 10 minutes a Russian base reports stolen nukes?
translation.fr: Silence radio à Greely et des missiles nucléaires se font voler ?

translation.en: Look, Greely's real, but this has to be a Russian exercise.
translation.fr: Greely, c'est avéré, mais ce doit être un exercice russe.

translation.en: If it were real, the Pentagon would've called us by now.
translation.fr: Sinon, le Pentagone nous aurait appelés.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
We are, sir.
It just came in now, sir.
We will, sir.
[in Russian] We have 16 missiles aimed at 16 American cities.
translation.fr: Nous avons 16 missiles braqués sur 16 villes américaines.

translation.en: After this day, America will no longer exist.
Jesus.
How do you steal nuclear missiles?
translation.fr: C'est possible, de voler des missiles ?

translation.en: Had to have been an inside job. You can't just walk in--
translation.fr: Ils devaient avoir quelqu'un à l'intérieur.

translation.en: Doesn't matter how they did it. What matters is those missiles are mobile.
translation.fr: Peu importe. Ces missiles sont mobiles. Ils peuvent cacher leurs têtes nucléaires.

translation.en: They can hide their nukes anywhere.
translation.fr: Ces missiles sont mobiles. Ils peuvent cacher leurs têtes nucléaires.

translation.en: Our satellites won't spot them till they launch. Captain.
translation.fr: Nos satellites ne les détecteront qu'après lancement. Capitaine.

translation.en: [Marshall] JJ.
This is on us now, you understand?
[Collins] Yes, sir.
We're the only thing standing between America and Armageddon.
translation.fr: On doit protéger le pays de l'apocalypse.

translation.en: You up for this? Don't worry about me, sir.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes prête ? - Ne vous en faites pas pour moi.

translation.en: Sorry. Had to ask.
translation.fr: Il fallait que je pose la question.

translation.en: I'll start the emergency lockdown. You do that.
translation.fr: - Je lance la procédure de confinement. - Parfait.

translation.en: I need to find Welsh and secure the HVAR codes.
translation.fr: Je vais voir Welsh pour les codes HVAR.

translation.en: Sir, wait Sir.
If they had people inside Tavlinka, and the shooters at Greely were all ours,
translation.fr: S'ils avaient des alliés à Tavlinka et que les forcenés de Greely sont des nôtres,

translation.en: they might have someone… here.
translation.fr: ils ont peut-être des alliés ici.

translation.en: Go.
[man] The keycard!
[man] The keycard! Get the keycard!
Mikael! The door. Open the door!
Goddammit, you're a big boy.
Did you send the SOS?
Did you just stab that dude in the eye with your gun?
translation.fr: Vous lui avez planté votre arme dans l'œil ?

translation.en: Yeah. Did you send the SOS?
Yeah, I sent it. They told me to stand by.
translation.fr: Je l'ai envoyé. On est en attente.

translation.en: [Collins] How is Beaver?
Bullet clipped him. He's unconscious, but he'll be okay.
translation.fr: Une balle l'a touché. Il est évanoui mais hors de danger.

translation.en: Is that acid?
[Shah] Why would they bring acid?
Destroy the circuitry.
Make this place useless.
What are we going to do?
You want to talk about it?
Leave now and you might escape with your life.
Let me in
and you might escape with yours.
You are the terrorists who stole the missiles from Tavlinka?
[man] You know, it would be a hell of a coincidence if I wasn't.
translation.fr: Ce serait une grosse coïncidence si ce n'était pas moi.

translation.en: Put one on Beaver.
And the shooters at Greely?
Subcontractors.
It's a gig economy.
Can't work at a US base without an extensive background check.
translation.fr: Ils font une enquête poussée sur toutes les recrues.

translation.en: You're telling me. The paperwork is a nightmare.
translation.fr: Je suis au courant, c'est un enfer administratif.

translation.en: That would mean you've been planning this--
[man] For a very long time.
[Collins] How long is a very long time?
Six years.
Not going so well for you, is it?
translation.fr: Ça ne se passe pas comme prévu.

translation.en: No plan survives contact with the enemy completely intact.
translation.fr: Aucun plan ne se déroule parfaitement au contact de l'ennemi.

translation.en: Are we enemies? You sound American.
translation.fr: On est ennemis ? Vous avez l'air Américain.

translation.en: [man] I am American.
And whether or not you and I are enemies
translation.fr: Quant à savoir si on est ennemis,

translation.en: is completely up to you.
What's your name? My name is Alexander Kessel.
translation.fr: - Comment vous vous appelez ? - Alexander Kessel.

translation.en: You say that like I should know it.
And now that you do, you will never forget it.
How about I just call you "asshole"?
You know, usually it takes a woman a second date to reach that conclusion.
translation.fr: Les femmes s'en rendent compte au deuxième rendez-vous, d'habitude.

translation.en: Nothing usual about me.
You know, I'm kind of getting that.
So, Captain, seems as though you and I are at an impasse
translation.fr: Capitaine, il semblerait que nous soyons dans une impasse.

translation.en: because I need to disable your command center so my people in Russia can fire those missiles.
translation.fr: Je dois désactiver votre C.O. afin qu'on puisse tirer nos missiles.

translation.en: And you need to keep me out.
But, full disclosure,
I have contained or killed everyone else on this vessel,
translation.fr: j'ai capturé ou tué tout le monde sur ce navire.

translation.en: so I will be getting into that room.
translation.fr: J'entrerai d'une façon ou d'une autre.

translation.en: Let me in now
and I will spare your lives.
And let millions of Americans die?
I don't think you realize why someone joins the Army.
translation.fr: Vous ignorez pourquoi on devient militaire.

translation.en: You are alone in the middle of the ocean, miles from any port,
translation.fr: Vous êtes seule au milieu de l'océan, à des kilomètres de tout port,

translation.en: way beyond the nearest shipping lane.
translation.fr: très loin du couloir maritime le plus proche.

translation.en: No one is going to be able to get here and save you before I cut through these doors.
translation.fr: Personne ne viendra vous sauver avant que je n'ouvre ces portes.

translation.en: Hey, Shah, how many janitors are there?
I don't know. Six, seven?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Six ou sept.

translation.en: -Which is it, six or seven? -[Shah] I don't know. I didn't hire them.
translation.fr: Six ou sept ? Je ne les ai pas engagés !

translation.en: This is a big rig. You couldn't have killed everyone so quickly.
translation.fr: Impossible d'avoir déjà tué tout le monde sur le navire.

translation.en: [Kessel] Nerve agent.
Released it through the A/C. Put 'em all right to sleep.
translation.fr: Je l'ai diffusé par la climatisation.

translation.en: [snorts] Bullshit.
If it makes any difference, they felt nothing.
translation.fr: Si ça importe, ils n'ont rien senti.

translation.en: We did have to shoot them to be sure.
translation.fr: Mais on a dû tirer pour confirmer.

translation.en: [Kessel] Don't worry.
The command center has its own A/C, and try as I might… You can't access it.
translation.fr: - Votre climatisation est séparée. - Vous n'y avez pas accès.

translation.en: Would we be having this awesome little conversation if I could?
translation.fr: Si c'était le cas, on ne discuterait pas.

translation.en: -SBX-1. This is Captain Collins. -Is this real?
-General Dyson. Where's Colonel Marshall? -[man] Everyone quiet.
translation.fr: Général Dyson. Où est le colonel Marshall ?

translation.en: He's dead, sir.
Dead? What happened?
Six to seven terrorists disguised as janitors seized our vessel.
translation.fr: Six à sept terroristes déguisés ont saisi notre vaisseau.

translation.en: They killed Marshall, they claim they have killed the crew,
translation.fr: Ils ont tué Marshall, auraient tué l'équipage

translation.en: -and tried to take the command center. -Tried?
translation.fr: - et ont essayé de prendre le C.O. - Essayé ?

translation.en: -And failed. -[Dyson] Who's there with you?
translation.fr: Et échoué. Qui est avec vous ?

translation.en: Corporals Shah and Baker.
Baker's unconscious. Hit by a bullet.
translation.fr: Baker est inconscient. Il est touché.

translation.en: How secure are you?
They're using blowtorches to cut through the outer door.
translation.fr: Ils attaquent la porte extérieure au chalumeau.

translation.en: Best guess…
Sixty minutes.
Make that 30 minutes.
-[Dyson] And the inner door? -Same. I don't know.
translation.fr: - Et la porte intérieure ? - Je l'ignore.

translation.en: What can you tell us about these terrorists?
American. Leader says his name is Alexander Kessel.
translation.fr: Ils sont américains. Le leader s'appelle Alexander Kessel.

translation.en: Get me a full background check on this guy. What else?
translation.fr: Faites des recherches sur ce type. Quoi d'autre ?

translation.en: They move like they've been trained, and they're using nerve agents.
translation.fr: Ce sont des pros et ils utilisent des agents innervants.

translation.en: What's happening at Greely? Shooters are dead.
translation.fr: - Et à Greely ? - Les tireurs sont morts,

translation.en: Unfortunately, so are the computers that control the interceptors. Burned them all with acid.
translation.fr: mais les ordinateurs qui contrôlent les intercepteurs aussi. Brûlés à l'acide.

translation.en: So it's just us. Afraid so.
translation.fr: - Il ne reste que nous. - En effet.

translation.en: A SEAL team is inbound to you.
You have to hang on a little longer.
-ETA? -Ninety minutes.
Are they joking?
-No, we are not joking. -[Collins] Madam President.
translation.fr: Pas du tout. Madame la Présidente.

translation.en: The terrorists have 16 mobile missile launchers
translation.fr: Les terroristes ont 16 lanceurs de missiles

translation.en: that we and the Russians cannot find.
Only reason they haven't launched them yet
is because you still have control of your interceptors.
translation.fr: c'est parce que vous avez encore vos intercepteurs.

translation.en: The second you don't, they will launch those missiles on the United States.
translation.fr: Dès que ce ne sera plus le cas, ils lanceront ces missiles sur le pays.

translation.en: Now, we don't have time to evacuate 16 cities,
translation.fr: Nous n'avons pas assez de temps pour évacuer 16 villes.

translation.en: so we're counting on you to keep those maniacs out of that room.
translation.fr: Nous comptons sur vous pour les tenir hors du centre opérations.

translation.en: Understood, Madam President.
We'll get back to you soon. Keep us updated.
translation.fr: On vous rappelle. Tenez-nous au courant.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Captain, hold that room.
translation.fr: Capitaine, ne les laissez pas entrer.

translation.en: [soldier] Let's move out! Go!
[operator] SEAL team, you are clear for immediate departure to SBX-1.
translation.fr: Équipe SEAL, vous êtes autorisés à partir pour SBX-1.

translation.en: Ninety minutes? There's no way we can last that long.
Not without a fight.
What? No. No, no.
I'm not a fighter. I'm a signal specialist.
I sit at a desk and stare at a screen, and know what? I like it.
translation.fr: Je suis assis devant un écran et ça me va très bien.

translation.en: Know why? Because nothing ever happens.
translation.fr: Il ne se passe jamais rien !

translation.en: I mean, I haven't fired a gun since basic. Don't worry. Guns still work the same.
translation.fr: - Je n'ai pas tiré depuis les classes ! - Les armes n'ont pas changé.

translation.en: Look, you can't count on me. You can't.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas compter sur moi.

translation.en: You surrender?
Do you?
Still quite enjoying fucking up your day.
translation.fr: Ça me fait plaisir de pourrir votre journée.

translation.en: Do you know anything about the fall of Rome?
translation.fr: Que savez-vous de la chute de Rome ?

translation.en: When the barbarians massed outside the city gates
translation.fr: Aux portes de la ville, les barbares

translation.en: they did unspeakable things to try and force the Romans to let them in.
translation.fr: ont commis des atrocités pour forcer les Romains à ouvrir.

translation.en: Exitus actum probat. "The result justifies the deed."
translation.fr: Exitus acta probat. La fin justifie les moyens.

translation.en: You remember Captain Welsh?
He's a father of four and a grandfather of seven.
[Collins] This is not gonna work.
Open the doors.
You can't let him die.
I will not open these doors.
If you don't, I will kill him.
I will not open these doors.
Last chance.
Kill anyone you want.
I will never open this door.
We're going to die too, aren't we?
We are not gonna die.
They're gonna get in here. They're gonna kill us.
translation.fr: Ils vont entrer et ils vont nous tuer.

translation.en: -Corporal. -There's nothing we can do to stop them!
translation.fr: - Caporal. - Et on ne peut rien y faire.

translation.en: Corporal Shah, they're not in here yet,
translation.fr: Caporal Shah, ils ne sont pas encore entrés.

translation.en: but if we're going to keep them out, I need you thinking clearly.
translation.fr: Mais pour les en empêcher, vous devez vous reprendre.

translation.en: We still have a job to do, right?
Right.
So go back to your post and keep our scanners on Tavlinka.
translation.fr: Retournez à votre poste et gardez nos scanners sur Tavlinka.

translation.en: And if they launch?
We intercept.
We also need to figure out every way they can penetrate this room.
translation.fr: On doit trouver toutes les façons dont ils peuvent entrer.

translation.en: Tunnel's the only direct way, in or out.
translation.fr: Le tunnel est le seul accès direct.

translation.en: What about indirect? Any new piping or conduits I should know about?
translation.fr: Y a-t-il des tuyaux ou des conduits ?

translation.en: Plumbing comes through a conduit in the floor
translation.fr: La plomberie est sous nos pieds,

translation.en: too small for anyone to fit through.
Same for the cables.
What else could they do? Think.
What about blowing the radar dome?
Dome's reinforced even stronger than we are. Same with the interceptors.
translation.fr: Le radôme est mieux protégé que le C.O. Pareil pour les intercepteurs.

translation.en: Get me eyes outside the hatches, top and bottom.
Get the shotgun.
Shoot him!
Shoot him now!
Looks like it was just the one.
When was the last time this thing was test fired? I don't know. Can it still work?
translation.fr: - Ce fusil a été entretenu ? - Je ne sais pas. Il marche encore ?

translation.en: Not without blowing up in your face.
-What about your pistol? -Out.
[sighs] So we have no weapons.
Help me.
[Shah] Thanks for saving Turbo.
[Collins] Who?
Turbo, the turtle. My kids gave him to me.
translation.fr: Turbo, la tortue. Mes enfants me l'ont offerte.

translation.en: How many kids you got?
Prisha, she's nine. Aditi, seven. And Kalyan, he's three.
translation.fr: Prisha a neuf ans. Aditi a sept ans, et Kalyan a trois ans.

translation.en: I haven't seen them for six months.
translation.fr: Je ne les ai pas vus depuis six mois.

translation.en: Best thing you can do for them now is help me stop those missiles.
translation.fr: Si vous voulez les protéger, aidez-moi à arrêter ces missiles.

translation.en: Anything?
[Shah] They got everyone.
He's just going to keep buzzing till you answer.
translation.fr: Il va sonner jusqu'à ce qu'on réponde.

translation.en: [Shah] What do you want now?
Captain, you should see this.
Think you're the first one to throw that in my face?
translation.fr: Vous croyez être le premier à me sortir ça ?

translation.en: Think you're gonna break me?
No.
And yes.
-[Collins] It's gonna take more than that. -I've got more coming.
translation.fr: Il en faudra plus que ça. Je n'ai pas fini.

translation.en: No, you don't. You're scrambling.
translation.fr: Si. Vous tentez tout ce que vous pouvez.

translation.en: -[Kessel] Am I? -Desperately.
How so?
You're a planner.
Six years, you said.
Looking for ways to beat the security, getting your people aboard,
translation.fr: que vous cherchez comment contourner la sécurité et monter à bord.

translation.en: you must have gone over and over these things
translation.fr: Vous avez dû réfléchir à chaque aspect

translation.en: until you were absolutely sure you planned for every possible outcome,
translation.fr: jusqu'à être certain d'avoir tout envisagé.

translation.en: but you couldn't plan for me.
You know how I know?
Because I'm meant to be in Fort Hunter right now on my new post.
translation.fr: car je devrais être à mon nouveau poste à Fort Hunter.

translation.en: Only fell through late last night when they reassigned me here.
translation.fr: Je n'ai été réassignée que tard dans la nuit.

translation.en: And now…
Now you can't beat me.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas me battre.

translation.en: I'll give you "unexpected."
But not unbeatable.
See, here's what I know.
I know that three years ago, you scored your dream job.
translation.fr: Il y a trois ans, vous avez décroché votre travail de rêve.

translation.en: Pentagon, three-star General.
A battlefield hero, his troops loved him.
translation.fr: Un héros adoré par ses troupes.

translation.en: They were going to build a statue to the guy.
translation.fr: On comptait lui ériger une statue.

translation.en: And he promised to take you all the way to the top,
translation.fr: Il a promis de vous emmener tout en haut,

translation.en: but then you learned the price you'd have to pay.
translation.fr: mais vous avez compris le prix.

translation.en: I know the Army review board just decided you made it all up.
translation.fr: Je sais que l'armée a décrété que vous aviez tout inventé.

translation.en: Threw you right back into the lion's den.
translation.fr: Ils vous ont renvoyée dans la fosse aux lions.

translation.en: I know that three-star welcomed you with open arms.
translation.fr: Le général vous a accueillie à bras ouverts.

translation.en: Because predators always want to show you exactly who's in charge.
translation.fr: Les prédateurs veulent toujours vous montrer qui commande.

translation.en: Wait, that general got discharged.
Which means you beat him. You won.
She won the battle, not the war.
translation.fr: Elle a gagné la bataille, mais pas la guerre.

translation.en: See, first came the hate mail.
The bounty hunt for these lewd photos…
translation.fr: TU AS ROMPU LE CODE … on a chassé ses photos suggestives…

translation.en: …then the death threats.
translation.fr: … et on l'a menacée de mort.

translation.en: [Kessel] All from within the army that you so proudly served.
translation.fr: Tout ça venait de l'armée que vous serviez avec fierté.

translation.en: Then finally…
that night.
Come on, wake up. JJ!
Come on. Wake up. Come back.
Papa?
It's okay, it's okay. Papa's here. It's okay. I got you.
translation.fr: Ça va. Papa est là. Je suis là.

translation.en: Papa… sorry.
You are beatable, Captain.
It's been proven.
If you are so right,
then what am I doing here?
Why do I still wear the uniform?
War's not over yet, motherfucker.
translation.fr: La guerre n'est pas finie, bâtard.

translation.en: You should be working with me.
In fact, I will give you 30 million dollars if you open these doors.
translation.fr: Je vous donnerai 30 millions si vous ouvrez ces portes.

translation.en: I will have you flown to the country of your choosing
translation.fr: Je vous enverrai dans le pays de votre choix

translation.en: where you can live the rest of your life in luxury.
translation.fr: où vous vivrez le reste de votre vie dans le luxe.

translation.en: If anyone has earned the right to walk away from this, it's you.
translation.fr: Si quelqu'un mérite de pouvoir partir, c'est bien vous.

translation.en: Thirty million dollars. What did the Army ever give you?
translation.fr: Trente millions de dollars. Qu'est-ce que l'armée vous a donné ?

translation.en: Your depressing old job in the middle of nowhere, where they can forget about you?
translation.fr: Votre boulot déprimant au milieu de nulle part ?

translation.en: They don't care about you.
Open these doors.
Take back your power.
That's how you win a war.
[pilot] SEAL team is inbound to SBX-1. ETA 67 minutes.
translation.fr: Équipe SEAL en direction de SBX-1. Arrivée dans 67 minutes.

translation.en: [Collins] They're in.
Open the door and you leave here a wealthy woman.
translation.fr: Ouvrez la porte et repartez riche.

translation.en: We still have time before you cut through this door.
translation.fr: On a du temps avant que vous entriez.

translation.en: -You really don't. -[gun cocks]
-[Collins] Beaver. -[Shah] What?
[Collins] Nice, Beaver.
Initiating satellite relay and EBS hack.
translation.fr: Lancement du relais satellite, piratage de l'EBS.

translation.en: We're in.
No, I have a new one.
And tell Danny to move in.
translation.fr: Dis à Danny de se rapprocher.

translation.en: Are you hurt?
I've had worse.
It really didn't have to be this way.
If Corporal Baker doesn't get hit, we avoid all of this.
translation.fr: Si Baker n'avait pas été touché, rien ne serait arrivé.

translation.en: If you're gonna kill me, just kill me.
translation.fr: Si vous comptez me tuer, faites-le.

translation.en: No mansplaining. I gave you choices.
translation.fr: - Je me passerai de vos mecsplications. - Vous aviez le choix.

translation.en: It was your decision to become enemies.
translation.fr: Vous avez choisi d'être mon ennemie.

translation.en: You were with them this whole time?
translation.fr: Tu étais avec eux tout le long ?

translation.en: [Shah grunts] Traitor.
America's the traitor.
[Collins] Always were full of shit, Beaver.
translation.fr: Tu as toujours été un connard.

translation.en: [Beaver] Ah, what do you know?
I love my country.
Hell, there was a time I would have even died for it. [sniffs]
translation.fr: À une époque, je serais mort pour lui.

translation.en: Never too late.
Shut up.
It's because of immigrants like you
translation.fr: C'est à cause des immigrés comme toi

translation.en: and like you
that I lost my job and the government took away my rights,
translation.fr: que j'ai perdu mon boulot, que le gouvernement m'a retiré mes droits

translation.en: started making up all kinds of shit to scare me.
translation.fr: et a commencé à inventer des conneries pour me faire peur.

translation.en: [Beaver] Shit.
I don't even recognize America these days.
translation.fr: Je ne reconnais plus les États-Unis.

translation.en: And that gives you the right to murder millions of people?
translation.fr: Et ça te donne le droit de tuer des millions de gens ?

translation.en: Well, it gives me the right to start looking out for myself.
translation.fr: Ça me donne le droit de m'occuper de moi.

translation.en: And now I got ten million ways to do that.
translation.fr: J'ai dix millions de façons de le faire.

translation.en: Money? That's what this is about?
[Beaver] Uh, yeah. It's what America's about.
translation.fr: Oui. L'Amérique tourne autour de l'argent.

translation.en: And if you don't get that,
translation.fr: Si tu ne comprends pas ça,

translation.en: you obviously haven't been paying attention, Shah.
translation.fr: tu n'es pas très attentif, Shah.

translation.en: Wake up, man.
Yeah, sure. Sure. Blame America. Blame the government.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. C'est la faute des États-Unis, du gouvernement.

translation.en: Blame everyone else but you.
translation.fr: C'est la faute du monde entier.

translation.en: That's what all losers do.
You just keep on talking, darlin'.
Because before this is all over,
I'm gonna do to you
what every enlisted grunt secretly wants to do
translation.fr: ce que chaque soldat rêve de faire

translation.en: to every female officer.
The only way you can get it, isn't it?
translation.fr: Tu ne peux baiser que comme ça.

translation.en: Hey. Another thing.
Never call a woman by anything other than her name.
translation.fr: N'appelle jamais une femme autrement que par son nom.

translation.en: Not honey, or honey pie, or sugar, or sugar pie,
translation.fr: Jamais ma belle, ma jolie, ma puce,

translation.en: or sweetie, or sweetie pie.
Not baby, sweetheart, ho, bitch,
and above all, most of all, beyond all else,
don't ever, ever,
call her "darlin'."
Satellite relay's live on the EBS. The Emergency Broadcast System?
translation.fr: - EBS opérationnel. - Le système de diffusion d'urgence ?

translation.en: Yeah, so that every camera on this rig
translation.fr: Oui, pour que toutes les caméras

translation.en: can be broadcast to any device that has smart capabilities.
translation.fr: puissent être diffusées sur n'importe quel appareil connecté.

translation.en: Wouldn't want anyone missing the show.
Mr. Kessel. Where's Captain Collins?
translation.fr: M. Kessel. Où est notre capitaine Collins ?

translation.en: She's here. She's unharmed.
translation.fr: Elle est là. Elle est indemne.

translation.en: Well… relatively.
As is Corporal Shah.
[Dyson] And Corporal Baker?
Howdy, General.
[Dyson] You two are servicemen.
You took an oath. How could you betray your country?
translation.fr: Vous avez prêté serment. Vous avez trahi votre pays !

translation.en: I swore an oath to the old America. Not this one.
translation.fr: J'ai prêté serment à la vieille Amérique. Pas celle-ci.

translation.en: [Dyson] What do you want?
[Kessel] From you?
Nothing.
I'm just waiting for America to join our little chat here.
translation.fr: J'attends que les États-Unis nous rejoignent.

translation.en: Dad's proud. That must be nice.
translation.fr: Papa est fier. Ça doit être sympa.

translation.en: EBS has slaved all signals.
Say hello to America, boss.
So you know it's got a big screen, great picture quality, you know,
the sound's kind of meh, but I don't really listen to the TV that much.
translation.fr: le son est pas terrible, mais je n'écoute pas ma télé.

translation.en: I play music when I watch and stuff so it doesn't really… Why'd it go black and white?
translation.fr: J'écoute de la musique en regardant. Pourquoi c'est en noir et blanc ?

translation.en: Where's the President? I'm here.
translation.fr: - Où est la présidente ? - Je suis là.

translation.en: If you launch even one of those missiles,
translation.fr: Si vous lancez un seul missile,

translation.en: I swear before God that we will hunt you down
translation.fr: je jure devant Dieu qu'on vous traquera

translation.en: and wipe you from existence.
That's enough. You're boring me.
I'm taking your bully pulpit now.
My fellow Americans, I am Alexander Kessel,
translation.fr: Mes chers compatriotes, je m'appelle Alexander Kessel,

translation.en: son of trust fund billionaire, Alexander Kessel Senior,
translation.fr: le fils du milliardaire Alexander Kessel père,

translation.en: who you may also know
is the current utterly unqualified US ambassador to the United Nations.
translation.fr: comme le très incompétent ambassadeur américain à l'ONU.

translation.en: Now, my associates in Russia control 16 nuclear missiles,
translation.fr: Mes associés en Russie contrôlent 16 missiles nucléaires,

translation.en: and I control the only interceptor missiles that are capable of stopping them.
translation.fr: et je contrôle les seuls missiles intercepteurs capables de les arrêter.

translation.en: Sixteen American cities have been targeted.
translation.fr: Seize villes américaines ont été visées.

translation.en: 300 million of you will die.
One city will be destroyed first
translation.fr: Une ville sera détruite en premier

translation.en: so that the rest of you can watch in horror.
translation.fr: pour que vous puissiez tous être témoins.

translation.en: Missile team one…
fire.
[computer voice] Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected.
Intercept launch expires in 12 minutes.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans 12 minutes.

translation.en: [Kessel] Now in 12 minutes, that missile I just launched, will pass over my head,
translation.fr: Dans 12 minutes, quand ce missile me survolera,

translation.en: at which point, it will be too late for this interceptor to catch it.
translation.fr: il sera trop tard pour l'intercepter.

translation.en: But which city has been chosen?
translation.fr: Mais quelle ville a été choisie ?

translation.en: Is it yours?
Wherever it lands, there's no time to run.
translation.fr: Où que ce soit, vous n'aurez pas le temps de vous enfuir.

translation.en: You can't flee.
If you guessed Los Angeles,
translation.fr: Si vous avez deviné Los Angeles,

translation.en: congratulations.
The City of Angels has 23 minutes left to live.
translation.fr: La Cité des anges a encore 23 minutes à vivre.

translation.en: Wait a second.
Once Los Angeles is gone,
translation.fr: Une fois Los Angeles disparue… Où est-ce que…

translation.en: And the fear of every American is at its peak… We're not closing yet.
translation.fr: - … et tous les Américains terrorisés… - On n'est pas encore fermés.

translation.en: …I will launch a second wave of 15 nuclear missiles.
translation.fr: … je lancerai une deuxième vague de 15 missiles nucléaires.

translation.en: Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Memphis, Chicago, St. Louis, Atlanta, Boston,
translation.fr: Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Memphis, Chicago, Saint-Louis, Atlanta, Boston,

translation.en: Philadelphia, Miami, New York.
And of course, Washington DC.
Today…
America dies in a paroxysm of fear.
translation.fr: les États-Unis mourront dans la terreur la plus absolue.

translation.en: America is the greatest lie ever told.
translation.fr: Notre pays est un gigantesque mensonge.

translation.en: American exceptionalism? Maybe once.
When the founders got rid of kings.
translation.fr: Quand les fondateurs boutaient les rois.

translation.en: When they declared that all men are created equal.
translation.fr: Quand ils ont déclaré l'égalité des hommes.

translation.en: Now they say ours are United States, but when was that true?
translation.fr: On parle d'États-Unis, mais quand étions-nous unis ?

translation.en: Was it true during the Civil War? Or Jim Crow?
translation.fr: Pendant la guerre de Sécession ? Pour les lois Jim Crow ?

translation.en: Hell, is it true now?
You know, this national lie, it's a festering wound,
translation.fr: Ce mensonge national est une plaie purulente

translation.en: and it's fatal.
There's no Band-Aid to patch it.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas la panser.

translation.en: No, the only way to save our nation and the promise it once held
translation.fr: Le seul moyen de sauver notre nation et la promesse qu'elle représentait jadis

translation.en: is to erase it. Start over.
translation.fr: est de tout effacer, de tout recommencer.

translation.en: So maybe then. when we are staring at each other
translation.fr: Peut-être que quand nous nous regarderons

translation.en: from across the rubble,
we will all agree that this time
we're going to get America right.
This is Corporal Rahul Shah.
Do you like being an American, Rahul?
With all my heart.
But you're a Hindu.
You can be both.
In America?
You've never been mocked for your faith?
translation.fr: On ne s'est jamais moqué de votre foi ?

translation.en: Never been the subject to enhanced screenings at airports?
translation.fr: On ne vous a jamais fouillé dans les aéroports ?

translation.en: Share with the world what you've seen.
translation.fr: Dites-leur ce que vous avez vu.

translation.en: I've seen you in the showers,
translation.fr: Je vous ai vu dans la douche,

translation.en: and I can see why you're obsessed with missiles.
translation.fr: et je comprends votre obsession pour les missiles.

translation.en: Pathetic.
I got this, boss. [inhaling]
This is Captain Joanna Julia Collins.
translation.fr: Voici la capitaine Joanna Julia Collins.

translation.en: JJ to her friends.
A soldier who has fought with honor and courage here today.
translation.fr: Une soldate qui s'est battue avec honneur et bravoure.

translation.en: Now, three years ago, one of our nation's top generals
translation.fr: Il y a trois ans, un de nos généraux les plus gradés

translation.en: tried to abuse his position of power and force her to have sex with him.
translation.fr: a voulu abuser de son pouvoir pour la forcer à coucher avec lui.

translation.en: Whose career was ruined?
You should be showering her with praise,
but she's a woman,
so instead her fellow service members
translation.fr: alors au lieu de ça, ses frères d'armes

translation.en: put out a bounty hunt on photos like this.
translation.fr: ont organisé une chasse aux photos telles que celle-ci.

translation.en: You're an asshole, dude.
I offered her 30 million dollars to give up her post today.
translation.fr: Je lui ai proposé 30 millions de dollars pour abandonner son poste.

translation.en: She refused.
She took that photo for charity, by the way.
translation.fr: Et cette photo était à but caritatif.

translation.en: What position were you? Were you goalkeeper?
translation.fr: Vous jouiez à quel poste ? Gardienne ?

translation.en: Goalkeeper. It's a tough position.
translation.fr: Oui, gardienne. C'est dur, comme poste.

translation.en: Beg your pardon?
You take a lot of hits, concussions, bruised ribs,
translation.fr: J'ai pris des coups, des chocs, des bleus aux côtes,

translation.en: but the most common injury is dislocated thumbs.
translation.fr: mais la blessure la plus commune, c'est la luxation du pouce.

translation.en: [Kessel] No! Shit! [panting]
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in six minutes.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans 6 minutes.

translation.en: Think you can make it?
Do you?
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans 5 minutes.

translation.en: You have five minutes. Hold her or kill her.
[computer voice] Interceptor launched.
[computer voice] Missile intercepted.
Fucking die already, would you?
Remember? I said, "Whatever happens, make sure you shoot her first." [sniffs]
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit : "Quoi qu'il arrive, bute-la en premier.

translation.en: "You just take her out of the fight, because if you don't do that,
if you don't just put her down right away, man, she's gonna be trouble."
translation.fr: "si tu ne la descends pas, elle va causer des problèmes."

translation.en: Beaver. She's… She's just one of those women, you know?
translation.fr: - Beaver. - C'est une de ces femmes, tu sais ?

translation.en: She just likes to just get under your skin and just needle you, man.
Like a… like a fucking needle.
translation.fr: Comme une aiguille qui te pique à répétition.

translation.en: This is a setback and nothing more.
translation.fr: C'est un contretemps, rien de plus.

translation.en: [Beaver] Setback?
Hey, did you hear that? It's a setback. That's cool.
translation.fr: Tant mieux. Tu entends ? Juste un contretemps.

translation.en: She shot the goddamn missile out of the sky!
translation.fr: Elle a descendu un foutu missile !

translation.en: It's one missile. There are 15 left.
translation.fr: Il y a quinze autres missiles !

translation.en: And what happens if she shoots them down too, huh?
translation.fr: Et si elle les descend aussi ?

translation.en: What then? What do we do then?
Our faces, man, they're all over the world right now.
translation.fr: Le monde entier a vu nos visages.

translation.en: What do we do then?
What's the statute of limitations on attempted nuking?
translation.fr: On encourt quoi pour une attaque nucléaire ?

translation.en: We are prepared for this. We have backup plans.
translation.fr: On est prêts. On a des plans de secours.

translation.en: Really? [sighs]
You played that one pretty close to the buzzer.
translation.fr: Vous avez attendu le dernier moment.

translation.en: [panting] Doing my best here, ma'am. Can you turn off the TV coverage?
translation.fr: - Je fais de mon mieux. - Vous pouvez désactiver la diffusion ?

translation.en: Give me a minute.
Not from here.
[Dyson] Understood.
How long till the SEALS get here?
Fifty minutes. They're going as fast as they can.
translation.fr: Dans 50 minutes. Ils font au plus vite.

translation.en: Not fast enough.
[Dyson] And we got some background on Alexander Kessel.
translation.fr: On a obtenu des informations sur Alexander Kessel.

translation.en: He was Army, military intelligence.
Started out doing Russian work,
then became a psy ops and torture specialist.
translation.fr: puis s'est spécialisé dans la torture.

translation.en: [Collins] Torture?
[Dyson] He was good. Too good sometimes. Killed two prisoners while he was torturing them.
translation.fr: Il était bon, voire trop bon. Il a tué deux prisonniers qu'il torturait.

translation.en: [Collins] Jesus. I'm dealing with a genuine psychopath.
translation.fr: - Je suis face à un vrai psychopathe. - Vous n'êtes pas seule.

translation.en: You're not alone. Lot of smart people here trying to figure out a way to help you.
translation.fr: - Je suis face à un vrai psychopathe. - Vous n'êtes pas seule. Beaucoup de gens intelligents essaient de vous aider.

translation.en: Tacticians, game theorists.
Fuck theory. I need some fucking soldiers with guns.
translation.fr: J'emmerde la théorie. J'ai besoin de soldats armés !

translation.en: I hear you, Captain. Come on, give her some guns, man.
translation.fr: - Je comprends. - Donnez-lui des armes, merde !

translation.en: If you don't mind me saying, you are one armor-plated woman.
translation.fr: Si je peux me permettre, vous êtes impressionnante.

translation.en: Army never should have picked a fight with you.
translation.fr: L'armée n'aurait jamais dû s'en prendre à vous.

translation.en: Got that right.
What'd I miss?
Not much.
Did we stop the missile?
Yeah. We stopped it.
Nice.
Wait. Where's all the bad guys?
That Alexander dude must be pissed at you.
Yeah, well, that's because I'm still fucking up his day.
translation.fr: Je continue à lui pourrir sa journée.

translation.en: [Collins] Papa?
Hey. How you feeling?
You up for some soup?
Sure.
You saw what they did. [Papa] I'll take care of it.
translation.fr: - Tu as vu ça ? - Je m'en occupe.

translation.en: Do not let them get to you now. Don't let them win.
translation.fr: Ne les laisse pas t'atteindre. Ne les laisse pas gagner.

translation.en: They hate me.
You told the truth.
Nobody cares about the truth. [Papa] I care.
translation.fr: - Tout le monde se fiche de la vérité. - Pas moi.

translation.en: I've lost everything. Everything I ever worked for.
translation.fr: J'ai perdu tout ce pour quoi j'ai travaillé.

translation.en: What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que je te répète toujours ?

translation.en: The one rule in life?
translation.fr: La seule règle dans la vie ?

translation.en: Never stop fighting. [Papa] You got fight in you, kid.
translation.fr: - Ne jamais baisser les bras. - Tu sais te battre.

translation.en: Always have. Just like your mama.
[Shah] Captain?
He wants to talk.
How long have I been out?
[Shah] Not long. Fifteen minutes or so.
[Collins] What now, asshole?
You think I'm a monster.
translation.fr: Vous me prenez pour un monstre.

translation.en: I was.
You know, growing up, I never summered where I wintered. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Petit, je ne passais jamais l'été là où je passais l'hiver.

translation.en: I was either on a yacht in the Hamptons or skiing in Val d'Isère.
translation.fr: J'étais sur un yacht dans les Hamptons ou au ski à Val d'Isère.

translation.en: Sucks to be you, dude.
I'm not complaining. I was the product of a failed society.
translation.fr: Je ne me plains pas. J'étais le produit d'une société malade.

translation.en: A society that consistently rewards money and ignores everything else.
translation.fr: Une société qui récompense l'argent et ignore tout le reste.

translation.en: What? You think my father became ambassador to the UN
translation.fr: Vous pensez que mon père est devenu ambassadeur

translation.en: because of any worthwhile diplomatic skills or because of his political donations?
translation.fr: grâce à ses talents de diplomate ou à cause de ses dons de campagne ?

translation.en: See, that's what we do in America.
We just figure because someone's rich that means they're smart.
translation.fr: On croit que la richesse est forcément liée à l'intelligence.

translation.en: My father's a moron.
He inherited his money. -He didn't earn it. -God.
translation.fr: Il a hérité de son argent. Il ne l'a pas gagné.

translation.en: Don't tell me this is about daddy issues.
I wouldn't expect you to understand.
I understand plenty.
Your father is a good man.
translation.fr: Votre père est un homme bien.

translation.en: The best.
He served too, didn't he?
Thirty-six years.
[Kessel] That's how he met your mom? When he was stationed in Spain?
translation.fr: Il a rencontré votre mère en Espagne, non ?

translation.en: Does he still hang out with his army buddies?
translation.fr: Il voit toujours ses potes de l'armée ?

translation.en: [Collins] Every day.
In Scottsdale, right?
[Kessel] The Patriot's Valley Veterans Retirement Home.
translation.fr: La maison de retraite pour vétérans Patriot's Valley.

translation.en: Room 6B.
Papa?
Let him go!
-He's got nothing to do with this! -Beg to differ.
translation.fr: - Il n'a rien à voir avec ça. - Au contraire.

translation.en: Let him go!
You said I could kill whoever, and you'd never open this door.
translation.fr: Je pouvais tuer qui je voulais, non ?

translation.en: Let him go, God damn you!
-[Kessel] Let's see if that's still valid. -Fuck you!
translation.fr: Voyons si ça tient toujours. Allez vous faire foutre !

translation.en: You think it's going to go any other way?
This is what I was trained for. Psy ops. Military intelligence.
translation.fr: C'est ma formation des renseignements militaires.

translation.en: Find your enemy's weak point and exploit it.
translation.fr: On appuie sur le point faible de l'ennemi.

translation.en: [gasps] Let him go!
If you don't open the door, I will take apart your father piece by piece.
translation.fr: Si vous n'ouvrez pas, je vais démembrer votre père lentement.

translation.en: -Fine. Have it your way. -No, no! Please. No, no, no!
-Do it. -No, no, no! No, don't! No!
-You know I can't. -[Kessel] Yes, you can.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas. Si. Vous pouvez choisir de mettre fin à tout ça.

translation.en: -No, I can't. -You can make this stop whenever you want.
translation.fr: Si. Vous pouvez choisir de mettre fin à tout ça.

translation.en: Let me speak with him. Let me speak with him. Okay?
-Let me speak with him! -Captain, no.
Let her speak.
[Collins] Papa?
-JJ. -I can't…
I can't… I can't lose you.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas te perdre.

translation.en: Listen to me. Are you listening?
Never stop fighting!
-Kill him. -No! No!
-No, please God. God! -[gunshot] No!
My daddy would have made me open that door.
translation.fr: Mon père m'aurait fait ouvrir cette porte.

translation.en: No question!
[Shah] How did they know?
How did they know to have people in Scottsdale?
translation.fr: Comment ont-il pu placer des hommes à Scottsdale ?

translation.en: The Army signed your transfer order last night, right?
translation.fr: L'armée a signé votre ordre de transfert hier soir.

translation.en: [panting] Right.
Which means they couldn't have known until a few hours ago.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont pu savoir qu'il y a quelques heures.

translation.en: [Kessel] You still don't get it? You're a pariah in your own ranks.
translation.fr: Vous ne comprenez pas ? Vous êtes une paria.

translation.en: The decision to have you transferred to this godforsaken rig
translation.fr: Ils ont décidé de vous envoyer ici il y a trois jours.

translation.en: was made three days ago. They only told you last night.
translation.fr: Ils ont décidé de vous envoyer ici il y a trois jours. Ils vous l'ont dit hier.

translation.en: I've known for 72 hours.
-[sharp inhale] What are you doing? -Activating my insurance policy.
If she's committed enough to watch her father die,
translation.fr: Elle est prête à regarder mourir son père.

translation.en: you will find that I am equally as committed.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je suis prêt à tout.

translation.en: That's the HVAR code. The emergency sinking protocol.
translation.fr: C'est le code HVAR. Le protocole de naufrage d'urgence.

translation.en: You're going to sink this whole rig?
Our telemetry's saying SBX-1's asset removal protocol just activated.
translation.fr: Le protocole de naufrage d'urgence de SBX-1 est activé.

translation.en: Don't tell me he--
He's going to sink us. [gasps] He's going to sink us using our own scuttling protocol.
translation.fr: Il va nous couler avec notre protocole de sabordage.

translation.en: [computer voice] High value asset removal protocol activated.
What do we do?
As long as we are above the surface, we can still fire our missiles.
translation.fr: Tant qu'on est à la surface, on peut tirer.

translation.en: [computer voice] Thirteen minutes until total vessel submersion.
translation.fr: Treize minutes avant la submersion totale.

translation.en: We've got 13 minutes to figure out a solution.
translation.fr: On a 13 minutes pour trouver une solution.

translation.en: I'm going down there.
[Shah] Down where? Into the hulls?
Yes. To close the valves one by one.
translation.fr: Oui, fermer les valves une à une.

translation.en: You can't go down there with wounds like that.
I'll manage.
I'll… I'll go.
I'll do it.
[Dyson] You're running out of time. We clock it at 13 minutes.
translation.fr: Le temps presse. On a estimé 13 minutes.

translation.en: So do we.
What's the ETA on the SEAL team? Twenty-five.
[sighs] Damn. I'll call you back.
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai. Je vous rappelle.

translation.en: Don't think this is what heroes look like.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas l'air d'un héros.

translation.en: That's exactly what they look like.
Whatever you say, Captain.
You can do this.
[Shah] You got this, Rahul.
You got this.
See you on the other side.
Little bastard grew some balls.
Take care of it.
This is mine.
HVAR's been activated. Twelve and a half minutes.
translation.fr: Naufrage dans douze minutes et demie.

translation.en: Well, how far away is he?
[pilot] Twenty-two minutes out. Ready your weapons.
translation.fr: On y est dans 22 minutes. Préparez vos armes.

translation.en: Okay, I've reached the hull.
You see the console?
This is gonna take a while.
-[Collins] You just have to slow it down. -[Shah] Copy that.
translation.fr: - Il faut juste gagner du temps. - Reçu.

translation.en: How are we looking, Captain?
[computer voice] Recalculating. Recalculating.
-12 minutes 11 seconds until… -[Collins] You just bought us two minutes.
translation.fr: - 12 minutes et 11 secondes… - Ça marche. Deux minutes de plus.

translation.en: Keep going.
Hell, yeah. I'm an ass-kicking, valve-closing machine.
translation.fr: Je suis une machine à fermer des valves !

translation.en: Nobody plugs leaks like me.
-Oh. Shit. -What?
I got company.
Get out of there. You hear me?
[Shah] It's too late.
It's not too late. Get out of there, now.
translation.fr: Il n'est pas trop tard, sortez !

translation.en: I'm sorry I couldn't help you more before, Captain,
translation.fr: Désolé d'avoir si peu aidé plus tôt.

translation.en: but I'm hoping this helps you now.
[computer voice] Recalculating. Recalculating.
Tell my children I love them.
translation.fr: Dites à mes enfants que je les aime.

translation.en: Howdy.
You don't have to do this, Beaver.
You're not a murderer.
You're right.
I'm not a murderer.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un meurtrier.

translation.en: I'm a fucking patriot.
translation.fr: Je suis un putain de patriote.

translation.en: Rahul? Rahul?
[Beaver] Shah can't come to the phone right now.
translation.fr: Shah ne peut pas répondre au téléphone.

translation.en: It's just you and the three of us.
translation.fr: Il n'y a plus que toi et nous trois.

translation.en: You're dead.
It was a valiant attempt.
I admire his courage, truly.
To be honest, I'd written him off. His psych evaluation said he'd fold under pressure.
translation.fr: Je ne croyais pas qu'il serait un facteur. Il était censé plier sous la pression.

translation.en: I didn't even bother to put people on his family.
translation.fr: Je n'ai mis personne sur sa famille.

translation.en: Turns out, he almost derailed me.
translation.fr: Et il a failli déjouer mes plans.

translation.en: No, I have a new one.
ZSB, Zulu, Sierra, Bravo, 1-9-9-6.
Tell Danny to move in.
translation.fr: Dis à Danny de se rapprocher.

translation.en: Danny?
Cut the feed.
That means nothing.
Then you won't mind if I show it to the world.
translation.fr: Alors ça ne vous dérangera pas si je le montre.

translation.en: Fine.
What the hell just happened?
ZSB. Zurich Schweitz Bank.
That's a Swiss bank account.
I should have known. [inhales]
You're not a nuclear terrorist or a fanatic. You've been paid for this.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas un fanatique. On vous paye pour cette mission.

translation.en: Hey, this is my operation. I'm the one in charge.
translation.fr: C'est mon opération. C'est moi qui commande.

translation.en: So what if I'm getting paid? Huh? Am I wrong?
translation.fr: Et alors, je n'ai pas le droit d'être payé ?

translation.en: I'm destroying a system that tried to destroy you.
translation.fr: Je détruis le système qui a voulu vous détruire.

translation.en: I'm making sure what happened to you doesn't happen to other women.
translation.fr: Je m'assure que ça n'arrive plus jamais à aucune femme !

translation.en: How much?
What are you doing? Who's paying you?
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que vous faites ? - Qui vous paie ?

translation.en: Seriously, stop with the tape.
What about the Russian sub?
Stop taping the window?
The Danilov, huh? Yeah, how's Danny?
translation.fr: Le Danilov, hein ? Comment va Danny ?

translation.en: Can you please…
Please stop taping the window. For me?
translation.fr: vous pouvez arrêter de scotcher la fenêtre ?

translation.en: You paid off a sub captain. Where is he taking you?
translation.fr: Vous avez payé un capitaine. Il vous emmène où ?

translation.en: Stop taping the window.
Someplace you can get a new name, a new face?
translation.fr: Quelque part où vous pourrez changer de nom et de visage ?

translation.en: Somewhere you can spend your blood money?
translation.fr: Où vous pourrez dépenser votre argent sale ?

translation.en: Stop with the damn tape, JJ.
translation.fr: Arrêtez avec ce foutu scotch, JJ.

translation.en: What about all that shit about your father?
Oh, fuck him. He ruined my family's name!
translation.fr: Je l'emmerde. Il a sali notre nom.

translation.en: Today I restore it with dignity and respect.
translation.fr: Je lui rends sa splendeur avec dignité.

translation.en: [Collins] Bullshit. I saw your file. You're just a total fucking psycho.
translation.fr: Conneries. J'ai lu votre dossier. Vous êtes un psychopathe.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Kessel] For what?
-[Collins] For showing me your weakness. -Oh, yeah. What's that?
translation.fr: - De m'avoir montré votre faiblesse. - À savoir ?

translation.en: [Collins] You want to get out of here alive.
[Kessel] You know what else I want? I want to hurt you, JJ.
translation.fr: Vous savez ce que je veux d'autre ? Vous faire du mal.

translation.en: I want to cut off your fingers. I want you to beg me to kill you!
translation.fr: Vous couper les doigts, que vous me suppliiez de vous tuer.

translation.en: Cabrón.
translation.fr: - Cabrón. - C'est vous, JJ, qui avez choisi de…

translation.en: Good job cutting the live feed. SEALS are 17 minutes out.
translation.fr: Bravo pour la diffusion. Les SEAL sont à 17 minutes.

translation.en: Well, that's not fast enough.
This rig is going to sink in 15 minutes.
translation.fr: Le navire va couler dans 15 minutes.

translation.en: And the second it goes under, these assholes will launch all their nukes.
translation.fr: Dès qu'il aura coulé, ils enverront tous leurs missiles.

translation.en: Is there anything you can do?
I sort of have this plan.
-But it's a little counterintuitive. -[President] Let's hear it, Captain.
translation.fr: C'est un peu contre-intuitif. On vous écoute, capitaine.

translation.en: I let them take the command center. What? That's precisely what we don't want to happen.
translation.fr: - Je leur laisse le centre opérations. - C'est l'inverse de ce qu'on veut.

translation.en: This rig is going down, and when it sinks, they win.
translation.fr: Dès que le navire aura coulé, ils auront gagné.

translation.en: We have to force them to fire the missiles before that happens. And then what?
translation.fr: - On doit les forcer à tirer avant ça. - Et ensuite ?

translation.en: And then I retake the command center and intercept their nukes.
translation.fr: Ensuite, je reprends le centre et j'intercepte les missiles.

translation.en: [Dyson] Inside 12 minutes?
Yes, sir.
[Dyson] Hold on.
Fuck.
Our game theory specialist is not convinced.
He's uh… concerned about your motivations.
By my calculations,
your proposed plan has a 14% chance of success.
translation.fr: votre plan a 14 % de chances de réussite.

translation.en: To give up that command center to a superior force
translation.fr: Abandonner le C.O. à une force supérieure

translation.en: with no certainty of regaining it is what we refer to as a negative outcome inducing event.
translation.fr: sans garantie de le récupérer risquerait de causer un résultat négatif.

translation.en: Are you serious with this shit?
Are you willing to gamble every life in America on your ability to retake the center?
translation.fr: Vous êtes prête à parier la vie de vos concitoyens sur ce plan ?

translation.en: I am.
I'm sorry. I cannot endorse such a move.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé. Je ne peux pas cautionner ça.

translation.en: Listen, genius. You're saying my plan is running at 14%?
translation.fr: Écoutez, le génie. Mon plan a 14 % de chances de réussir ?

translation.en: Yours is zero!
You haven't been beat up, strangled, or shot defending this rig today.
translation.fr: On ne vous a pas tabassé, étranglé ni tiré dessus aujourd'hui.

translation.en: So I think you'll find I'm kind of fucking motivated here.
translation.fr: On peut dire que mes motivations sont pures, putain.

translation.en: We hear you, Captain.
I can do this, sir. I know I can.
translation.fr: J'en suis capable, monsieur. Je le sais.

translation.en: Half the people here think you're crazy. The other half think you're a rock star.
translation.fr: La moitié des gens ici vous croient folle. L'autre moitié vous admire.

translation.en: Fortunately, I'm one of the latter.
translation.fr: Je fais partie de ces derniers.

translation.en: Do what you have to do, Captain.
[Collins] Still there?
-What do you think? -[Collins] I think you're getting nervous.
translation.fr: À votre avis ? Vous stressez. Si vous échouez, vos partenaires vous tueront.

translation.en: If you fail here, your partners will kill you.
translation.fr: Vous stressez. Si vous échouez, vos partenaires vous tueront.

translation.en: You want this room? Come and get it.
[whispers] Intercom off.
Give me the radio.
Beaver, what's your ETA?
[Beaver] About 30 seconds.
She's taped up the window. I can't see in the room.
translation.fr: Je ne vois plus dans la pièce.

translation.en: I need you to get in there now.
[Beaver] Relax. I'm there.
I ain't see her. She gone.
translation.fr: Je ne la vois nulle part. Elle est partie.

translation.en: [Kessel] What do you mean, gone? Where is she?
Shit.
[Kessel] What? She's on the roof.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Elle est sur le toit.

translation.en: Attention all missile teams, we have control of the interceptor.
Fire all missiles. Repeat, fire all missiles.
translation.fr: Tirez tous les missiles. Je répète, tirez tous les missiles.

translation.en: [computer voice] Multiple missile launch detected. Multiple missile launch detected.
[Beaver] Woo! Let's go, baby. Light 'em up!
[computer voice] Targets acquired. Targets acquired.
Seattle, San Francisco, Las Vegas, Denver, St. Louis, Memphis,
translation.fr: Seattle, San Francisco, Las Vegas, Denver, Saint-Louis, Memphis,

translation.en: Chicago, Cincinnati, Atlanta, Miami, Washington DC,
Boston, New York, Dallas, Philadelphia.
Kill her.
"Come make ten million," he says.
"Buy yourself a private island," he says. "Piece of cake."
translation.fr: "Tu t'achèteras une île privée. Ce sera facile."

translation.en: Oh, man. [inhales]
Nope.
Give me your knife.
Do it.
Acid.
[Beaver] Where are you, darlin'?
[in singsong] Come out, come out, wherever you are.
Apologies, ladies and gentlemen, for that rude interruption,
translation.fr: Cher public, mes excuses pour cette interruption.

translation.en: but as you can see,
I have retaken this command center and the nukes are on their way.
translation.fr: j'ai repris le centre opérations et les missiles sont en route.

translation.en: Hey, the goalie ain't up here.
She has to be. Where else could she…
…be?
She is on the roof, Beaver.
translation.fr: Elle est sur le toit, Beaver.

translation.en: There's no one down here.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in eight minutes.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans 8 minutes.

translation.en: [whispers] Ivan.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in seven minutes.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans 7 minutes.

translation.en: Come on.
[Beaver] Can't let you do that, darlin'.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas te laisser faire, chérie.

translation.en: Let me go, Beaver. You don't want this.
translation.fr: Lâche-moi, Beaver. Tu ne veux pas faire ça.

translation.en: Hell, I told you what I wanted.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit ce que je voulais.

translation.en: You're gonna die here.
No, I'm not.
I'm on the next submarine out of here. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Je pars dans le prochain sous-marin.

translation.en: With Alexander?
He's gone. [panting]
-[Collins groans] -[Beaver] Bullshit.
I saw him go.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement dans 5 minutes.

translation.en: [snickers] Really think a little bit of razor wire is gonna kill me?
translation.fr: Tu penses que des barbelés vont me tuer ?

translation.en: Gravity, darlin'.
[father] JJ… JJ, come on.
What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que je te répète toujours ?

translation.en: The one rule in life?
translation.fr: La seule règle dans la vie ?

translation.en: Never stop fighting.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in three minutes.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans trois minutes.

translation.en: [computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 60 seconds.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans une minute.

translation.en: There she is!
There she is!
Get up. Get up!
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 40 seconds.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans 40 secondes.

translation.en: [panting] Don't give up. Don't give up.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 30 seconds.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans 30 secondes.

translation.en: [computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 20 seconds.
translation.fr: Fermeture fenêtre de lancement intercepteur dans 20 secondes.

translation.en: [computer voice] Ten seconds. Nine, eight, seven, six,
translation.fr: Dix secondes. Neuf, huit, sept, six,

translation.en: five, four, three, two, one.
[computer voice] Interceptors launched.
Come on. Come on. Come on.
[computer voice] Multiple missile interception complete.
translation.fr: Tous les missiles ont été interceptés.

translation.en: Fourteen percent.
[Kessel] Look at you.
Still going, huh?
You know you really did fuck up my day.
translation.fr: Vous m'avez vraiment pourri ma journée.

translation.en: But I brought America to the brink, and I'll do it again.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai poussé l'Amérique au bord du gouffre, et je le referai.

translation.en: You may have won the battle, but not the war.
translation.fr: Vous avez gagné la bataille, mais pas la guerre !

translation.en: [panting] Told you. War's not over yet.
translation.fr: Je vous ai dit que la guerre n'était pas finie.

translation.en: This is for my dad, asshole.
[Kessel] There's my ride.
[Kessel] There's no room for you.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de place pour vous.

translation.en: [man 1, in Russian] I've arrived. I can see him.
translation.fr: Je suis arrivé. Je le vois.

translation.en: [man 2, in Russian] You know what to do.
[man 1] What about the woman?
[man 2] Your choice.
[pilot, in English] Target in sight. We'll arrive in 30 seconds.
translation.fr: Cible en vue. On y est dans 30 secondes.

translation.en: Contact. Russian submarine looks like it's bugging out.
translation.fr: Contact. Le sous-marin russe a l'air de partir.

translation.en: We have visual on Captain Collins on the roof.
translation.fr: Je vois la capitaine Collins sur le toit.

translation.en: Madam President.
They told me you were awake. It is good to see you, Captain.
translation.fr: On m'a dit que vous étiez réveillée. C'est bon de vous voir, capitaine.

translation.en: Is Fort Greely--
[President] Greely's back up. Interceptors on standby.
translation.fr: C'est réglé, les intercepteurs sont opérationnels.

translation.en: And we're going to replace SBX-1 as soon as possible,
translation.fr: Nous allons remplacer SBX-1 dès que possible.

translation.en: but don't worry, nobody is going to send you back out there.
translation.fr: Mais pas d'inquiétude, on ne vous y renverra pas.

translation.en: In fact, I think a soldier of your caliber
translation.fr: À vrai dire, je pense qu'une soldate de votre calibre

translation.en: would be better put to use on my National Security staff.
translation.fr: serait plus utile dans mon Conseil de sécurité nationale.

translation.en: What do you say?
[President] I'll take that as a yes.
translation.fr: Je prends ça comme un oui.

translation.en: Thank you, Madam President.
Oh, and you have another visitor.
-Papa? -JJ.
I… I thought you were…
Turns out your dad has some very well-armed Army buddies
translation.fr: Votre père a des anciens collègues bien armés

translation.en: watching over him in that retirement home.
They saw what was happening on TV.
Broke down my goddamn door.
Saved my finger. Lost my door.
translation.fr: Ils ont sauvé mon doigt, mais ils ont cassé ma porte.

translation.en: Well, I'll expect you to report to the White House next week, Captain.
translation.fr: Je vous attends à la Maison-Blanche la semaine prochaine, capitaine.

translation.en: Come here. Dad.
This is for you.
Another survivor.
SEAL team found him swimming around the wreckage of SBX-1.
translation.fr: L'équipe des SEAL l'a trouvée près des débris de SBX-1.

translation.en: He belonged to Corporal Shah.
[father sighs] I heard what happened. I'm sorry.
translation.fr: J'ai appris ce qui s'est passé. Navré.

translation.en: You know, sometimes it's… it's best to talk about those we've lost so we don't forget.
translation.fr: Parfois, c'est mieux de parler des disparus pour ne pas les oublier.

translation.en: His name was Rahul.
[father] Rahul?
He liked poker… [father] I see.
translation.fr: - Il aimait jouer au poker. - Je vois.

translation.en: …but he wasn't very good at it.
